news_header: Munich police investigate stickers with QR codes on graves, revealing names and locations of the deceased.
news_original_title: Yli 1­ 000 salaperäistä tarraa ilmestyi Münchenin hautausmaille – poliisi tutkii
news_text: In Munich, police are investigating over 1,000 stickers with QR codes placed on tombstones in three cemeteries. The codes link to information about the deceased. Some tombstones were damaged during removal of the stickers, and the purpose remains unclear. Authorities urge witnesses to come forward.
